body.p: Indiana, resident and soldier. Indiana native. Served in 24th Indiana Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as captain in August 1861. Assigned to 65th Indiana Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as lieutenant colonel and colonel from August 16, 1862 to August 29, 1864. Discharged for disability.
